verses.name: Jeremiah 2:14
verses.text: Is Israel a servant? is he a homeborn slave? why is he spoiled?

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:15
verses.text: The young lions roared upon him, and yelled, and they made his land waste: his cities are burned without inhabitant.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:16
verses.text: Also the children of Noph and Tahapanes have broken the crown of thy head.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:17
verses.text: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken the Lord thy God, when he led thee by the way?
